title: Adolf’s Meat Products Recalls Assorted Deli Meat Due to Possible Listeria Adulteration
summary: EDITORS NOTE: FSIS has updated the recall release issued on Oct. 27, 2015 to reflect that the products associated with recall 132-2015 were only distributed at the companys establishment in Connecticut.WASHINGTON, Oct. 26, 2015 Adolfs Meat Products, a Hartford, Conn. establishment, is recalling approximately 224...
